td.content: s:pt reports Heart from time to time. pt is a white male retired aged 75 yrs. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 94.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

s:patient presents with Liver. patient is a 76 yo M retired. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years he denies smoking o:Height 188 cm, Weight 95.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ibuprofen - 600 mg every 8 hours for fever, and ordered Viral Hepatitis A Antibody.

s:pt presents with Heart for 3 days. he has a history of Heart Murmur for past 4 years. he is a 76 yr old white M retired. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 91.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.
